member.name: T:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient
member.summary: Class communicating with the MSAGL library TODO: still some issues, esp. with node nesting

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Creates a new MSAGLClient instance, adding its GViewer control to the hosting form (at position 0).

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.GetLayoutOptions
member.summary: Retrieves the available options of the current layouter of MSAGL and the current values.
member.returns: A description of the available options of the current layouter of MSAGL and the current values.

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.SetLayoutOption(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a layout option of the current layouter of MSAGL.
member.returns: "optionset\n", or an error message, if setting the option failed.

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.ForceLayout
member.summary: Forces MSAGL to relayout the graph.

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.Sync
member.summary: Sends a "sync" request and waits for a "sync" answer

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.ChangeNode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the node realizer of the given node. If realizer is null, the realizer for the type of the node is used.

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.graphViewerAndSequenceDebugger.MSAGLClient.ChangeEdge(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the edge realizer of the given edge. If realizer is null, the realizer for the type of the edge is used.
